title: Handwriting font
content:
I'm looking for the font in this graphic, its a handwriting font and I know I've seen it before but I can't figure out what one it is

[http://images2.fanpop.com/images/photos/3600000/3-16-Sandcastles-in-the-...](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008164145/http:/images2.fanpop.com/images/photos/3600000/3-16-Sandcastles-in-the-Sand-how-i-met-your-mother-3609327-500-281.jpg?1412569461164 "http://images2.fanpop.com/images/photos/3600000/3-16-Sandcastles-in-the-Sand-how-i-met-your-mother-3609327-500-281.jpg?1412569461164")

Any help would be appreciated!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [3-16-Sandcastles-in-the-Sand-how-i-met-your-mother-3609327-500-281.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008164145/http:/typophile.com/files/3-16-Sandcastles-in-the-Sand-how-i-met-your-mother-3609327-500-281.jpg) | 26.35 KB |
author: sassypie

comments.content:
It reminds me of Tekton, but isn't Tekton.

So far, no database hits. I'll keep looking....

Closest similar font I could find is Charisma:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/gallofonts/charisma/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008164145/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/gallofonts/charisma/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/gallofonts/charisma/")
Thanks so much for the help!
